Description: Worked flint blade, rectangular in shape and flat, trapezoidal in section. The lower end is cut off and the upper end broken off. retouch on both lateral sides. Dark grey to black coloured stone.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), Mound β, X
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
